hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Ibn 'Umar through a different chain of narrators from the Prophet (ﷺ). This version adds:He engraved on it "Muhammad, the Messenger of Allah." and said: "No one must engrave anything in the manner of this signet-ring of mine. He then transmitted the rest of the tradition

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي اتِّخَاذِ الْخَاتَمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported About Using A Ring
